data.name: XMailMessage
desc: Represents a mail message.
**since**
OOo 2.0

methods.name: addAttachment
desc: Add a file attachment to a mail message.
param aMailAttachment [in] specifies a file which should be attached to this mail message.

methods.name: addBccRecipient
desc: Add a BCC recipients e-mail address to the list of recipients of this mail message.
If the e-mail address doesn't conform to RFC 822 sending the mail message will fail.

methods.name: addCcRecipient
desc: Add a Cc recipients e-mail address to the list of recipients of this mail message.
If the e-mail address doesn't conform to RFC 822 sending the mail message will fail.

methods.name: addRecipient
desc: Add a recipients e-mail address to the list of recipients of this mail message.
If the e-mail address doesn't conform to RFC 822 sending the mail message will fail.

methods.name: getAttachments
desc: Return a sequence of MailAttachment's that will be attached to this mail message.

methods.name: getBccRecipients
desc: Return a sequence of the e-mail addresses of all the BCC recipients of this mail message.

methods.name: getCcRecipients
desc: Return a sequence of the e-mail addresses of all the Cc recipients of this mail message.

methods.name: getRecipients
desc: Return a sequence of the e-mail addresses of all recipients of this mail message.

properties.name: Body
desc: The body of the mail message.

It is expected that the transferable delivers the data as a string. Although a transferable may support multiple data flavors only the first data flavor supplied will be used to retrieve the data and it is expected that the data will be provided as a string.

properties.name: ReplyToAddress
desc: The e-mail address where replies on this mail message should be sent to.
If the e-mail address doesn't conform to RFC 822 sending the mail message later will fail. If no ReplyToAddress is set replies go to the SenderAddress.

properties.name: SenderAddress
desc: The e-mail address of the sender of this mail message.
The e-mail address has to conform to RFC 822.

properties.name: SenderName
desc: The display name of the sender of this mail message.

properties.name: Subject
desc: The subject of a mail message.
